sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_9d27c70e6da231007f4467a12972448c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>service.sn-glideAjax</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('sn.glideAjax', []);
angular.module('sn.glideAjax').service('GlideAjax', function($rootScope) {
	var glideAjax = window.GlideAjax;
	glideAjax.prototype.getJSON = function(callback) {
		this.getXMLAnswer(function(answer) {
			var answerJSON = JSON.parse(answer);
			callback(answerJSON);
			$rootScope.$apply();
		});
	};
		
	return glideAjax;
});]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-03 23:33:16</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9d27c70e6da231007f4467a12972448c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>service.sn-glideAjax</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_9d27c70e6da231007f4467a12972448c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-03 23:57:42</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_script_a11fe8126de231007f4467a129724408
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>service.uiMacroTemplate</name><script><![CDATA[angular.module('sn.uiMacro', []);
angular.module('sn.uiMacro').service('uiMacroTemplate', function() {
	return function(templateName) {
		return 'AJAXJellyRunner.do?template=' + templateName;	
	}
});]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-03-04 07:11:52</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a11fe8126de231007f4467a129724408</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>service.uiMacroTemplate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_a11fe8126de231007f4467a129724408</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-03-04 07:20:05</sys_updated_on><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
